name: Loaded Mashed Potatoes
description: Your fave bag of potato chips doesn’t belong at the dinner table, so serve up the next best thing: mashed potatoes loaded with the bold ‘n tangy taste of all-dressed chips! To save time and incorporate more fibre into your diet, skip peeling the potatoes—it’ll still be delicious!

ingredients.name: All-Dressed Fries Seasoning or Cajun Fries Seasoning

preparation: Peel potatoes; cut into 1" cubes. Place in Multipurpose Steamer. Cover; microwave on high 12–14 min ,or until potatoes are soft.
Using Ground Meat Separator, mash potatoes with cheese, milk, butter, and seasoning to desired consistency. Fold in green onions. Add topper, if desired.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (113 g) lean protein and 1 cup chopped veggies.

products.name: All-Dressed Fries Seasoning
summary: When you can’t decide on a flavour, we say, have ‘em all! All Dressed is a classic Canadian chip seasoning and we’ve put an epic twist on it. Salt & vinegar, ketchup, sour cream & onion, and BBQ are all here in one amazingly tasty, zero sodium blend. You’re going to want to shake this on fries, homemade chips, popcorn, potato salad, and more!

products.name: Cajun Fries Seasoning
summary: We love to make our taste buds dance with this Cajun Fries Seasoning. This blend of premium herbs and spices creates an earthy, piquant flavour that tastes great and packs a punch. It's perfect for anyone who wants to add excitement and heat to their favourite snack. Sprinkle as much or as little as you like over your spuds for a healthy alternative to restaurant fries with added seasonings.

products.name: Multipurpose Steamer
summary: Like a casserole dish in design & purpose, this cooking utensil is made of silicone & has a 14-cup capacity.

products.name: Ground Meat Separator
summary: Break up ground meat much easier & faster with this purpose-built tool.
